desc: Thank you for visiting CBC Computers. We strive to make every purchase a positive experience. These laptops are fully refurbished and thoroughly tested to meet your satisfaction. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact us. We offer a no-hassle return policy so buy with confidence.

layout.text: Everything You Need at One Location
Refurbished HP, Dell, and Lenovo Computers

We specialize in Windows based laptops and desktops but most importantly great customer service. We've been in business for almost 20 years with commitment to quality and customer satisfaction that is second to none. Thank you in advance for the opportunity to serve you.
